body_html: Ah, ok, well fwiw, for docker I just installed it from http://docs.docker.com/v1.8/installation/ and ran the command they give on the tensorflow website docker run -it b.gcr.io/tensorflow/tensorflow. It all worked perfectly fine. Well, I had to open my computer's firewall to accept loopback connections, but I don't that's related to either docker or TF.

body: Ah, ok, well fwiw, for docker I just installed it from http://docs.docker.com/v1.8/installation/ and ran the command they give on the tensorflow website docker run -it b.gcr.io/tensorflow/tensorflow.  It all worked perfectly fine.   Well, I had to open my computer's firewall to accept loopback connections, but I don't that's related to either docker or TF.
